title: Compose window duplicate
content: • every time I send a msg in Android the msg gets sent but there's duplicate Compose window behind it that has to be closed... using version 10.0 ... please advise - thanks
creator: michael_ny

title: Merging Emails From Different Computers
content:
Hi. I have Thunderbird running on two, different computers. The older computer has many emails I'd like to merge on to the newer computer with Thunderbird.

Does anyone know how to do this? All I've been able to find is a solution that overwrites the emails of one or the other profile folders. I'd like to merge.

Thanks.
creator: merrick4

title: HTML Emails do not display HTML content just text of everything.
content: I cannot find a setting which activates HTML display. Only raw text displayed. I notice others have the same problem and it only started yesterday 7th June 2025.
creator: vk2aab

title: Thunderbird version 128.11.0esr
content:
I am currently running Thunderbird version 128.11.0esr on Windows 11 on a Dell desktop computer.

I have been running Thunderbird for years. But back in February 2025 my previous Dell desktop died, so had to purchase a new Dell desktop running Windows 11. Then I downloaded Thunderbird and installed it on the new desktop then copied over the profiles that fortunately had been backed up just a week prior. It has been working fine. (When I installed the Thunderbird on the new computer I did not realize there was a difference between ESR (Extended Support Release) channel and Release channel; I just downloaded and installed what I came upon.)

However, around 5/28/25 got a pop-up message that stated something to the effect it is recommended I upgrade to Thunderbird Release.

Should I download and install a new Thunderbird from the Release channel? Will the existing profiles work with the Release channel Thunderbird? Thank you for your help.
creator: jpwvols
